Text: The Rwandan Revolution, also known as the Social Revolution or Wind of Destruction (Kinyarwanda: "muyaga" ), was a period of ethnic violence in Rwanda from 1959 to 1961 between the Hutu and the Tutsi, two of the three ethnic groups in Rwanda.

Triplets:<The Rwandan Revolution
1:
--------------------
<Text: Rwandan Revolution:  The revolution saw the country transition from a Belgian colony with a Tutsi monarchy to an independent Hutu-dominated republic.>
